content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the defendant has been ordered to pay a total of €97288 which includes professional fees stamp duty and court fees the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the defendant has been ordered to transfer a vehicle to the plaintiff and pay them compensation of eur 2710 for the vehicle the court has also declared that the defendant is responsible for the obligations related to a credit agreement made during the marriage the court has dissolved the marriage due to the defendants fault and ordered the defendant to pay child maintenance and the costs of the proceedings the defendant has also been ordered to pay the applicants legal costs the rest of the applicants requests have been dismissed

metadata.cost: 900.00 EUR (professional fees) + 46.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 26.88 EUR (court fees)
